item.description:
COASTAL MAINE KAYAK
DEMO DAY

Come and try before you buy.

VALLEY SEA KAYAK - WERNER PADDLES - STAND-UP BOARDS - NECKY KAYAKS - KOKATAT PFD'S

DURING THE OLD PORT FESTIVAL
EAST-END BEACH PORTLAND, MAINE

June 13th. 2010
11:00am to 3:00pm


Coastal Maine Kayak will provide PFDs (life vests) and paddles.
All PFD's must be checked before trying boats (Feel free to bring your own equipment)

Details
Cost is free. Signed waivers required. Minimum age is 14.
Signature of a parent or legal guardian needed for participants under the age of 18.

www.coastalmainekayak.com â€¢ 207.967.6065٠
